actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT SUM("amount")
FROM "Payment" 
WHERE
    "Payment"."createdAt" >= {{moment(DatePicker1.selectedDate).format("YYYY-MM-DD")}}::date - interval '330 minutes'
    AND
    "Payment"."createdAt" <= {{moment(DatePicker2.selectedDate).format("YYYY-MM-DD")}}::date + interval '1110 minutes' AND "status" = 'responseReceivedSuccess' AND "paymentForId" IN ('4511');
